content: the 6-day baby blanket is made with cheerful saturated gender-neutral colors and has wide stripes with a squared off striped edge that s finished off with playful points kits available at good loops 1 join betty mcknit s online community on facebook 1 subscribe to her youtube channel 2 and join the 6-day kid blanket group 3 on facebook for pattern help and to show off all your 6dkb creations 1 https //www facebook com/groups/bettysbesties/ 2 https //www youtube com/c/bettymcknit 3 https //www facebook com/groups/6daykidblanket 1 https //www tinyurl com/bettysgoodloops 2 https //www facebook com/6daykidblanket
